group_1.textLeft: Because it's my dream...
Yeah, my dream!
Going to lots of places, seeing lots of things.
My dream is to meet all kinds of people!

group_1.textRight: So that's probably...what you wished for...

group_1.textLeft: Not directly, but...
I used to be blind.
So when Kyubey showed up, I made a request.
I wished to be able to see.

group_1.textRight: Sorry, I didn't mean to pry...!

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Oh, don't worry about that!
Even though I couldn't see, everyone was very@kind to me, and I enjoyed my life.
I never felt unhappy.
But I couldn't keep depending on others@forever.
That's why I made my wish.

group_1.textRight: I see, so that's your dream...

group_1.textLeft: It was only thanks to my wish that I realized it.
What I look like...what the people around me@look like...
How bright the sun is, how clear the ocean is...
I didn't know any of that...and I'd been living@my whole life without knowing.

group_1.textRight: Okay! I understand!@Let's go! To lots of places!
There's still lots of unusual places in Kamihama.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, yeah! Sounds like fun!
Hmm... But...
I wonder where we should go...

group_1.textRight: (I want to find "memorable taiyaki" at any cost.)
(And use my knowledge of Kamihama to the@fullest...)

group_1.textLeft: What's the matter?!

group_1.textCenter: Kamihama is an incredible place. I'm sure@there's a lot of things waiting for me!
